actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make a study of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands in order to promote improved utilization of water and related land resources.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, in cooperation with the government of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, to study a development and conservation plan for water and land resources of such territory.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make a study of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands in order to promote improved utilization of water and related land resources.
